mng: to lend on interest, to borrow, a loan, leniency, to make excuses, to pardon, to forgive

exm.mng: a loan, to provide a loan (e.g. bank), to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
to borrow or lend money, debit and credit items on a balance sheet
to be duty bound, to be one's unshrinkable responsibility
subprime mortgage crisis, abbr. for 次級房屋信貸危機|次级房屋信贷危机[ci4 ji2 fang2 wu1 xin4 dai4 wei1 ji1]
subprime lending, abbr. for 次級貸款|次级贷款[ci4 ji2 dai4 kuan3]
